text: , (born Kakamigahara, September 29, 1966) is a Japanese rugby union hooker and coach. Kunda played for Toshiba Brave Lupus, a team he coached to a League title victory in 2007. Originally from Gifu Prefecture, he was educated at University of Tsukuba (Tsukuba Daigaku). He served as the captain in the 1995 Rugby World Cup and is now Head Coach of the Japan U20s squad. ==References== ==External links== *Scrum.com player profile Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese rugby union players Category:Japanese rugby union coaches Category:Rugby union hookers Category:Sportspeople from Gifu Prefecture Category:Japan international rugby union players Category:Toshiba Brave Lupus players Category:Asian Games medalists in rugby union Category:Rugby union players at the 1998 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1998 Asian Games
title: Masahiro Kunda
